titleStmt.title: To all those that vvorship in temples made vvith hands, but more especially to them of Pauls, as a vvarning to them to repent.
titleStmt.author: D. W. (Dorothy White)

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed: From the Counter Prison in Wood-street, the 24. of the first month, 1663. Dorothy White.
Lower portion of numeral "3" at bottom of page did not print.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library (London, England).
